derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: via Old French locuste from Latin locusta 'locust, crustacean'

entry.def: Locusts are large insects that live mainly in hot countries. They fly in large groups and eat crops.

means.word_mean: 1. migratory grasshoppers of warm regions having short antennae
2. hardwood from any of various locust trees
3. any of various hard-wooded trees of the family Leguminosae

sentences.en: In no time the locusts came down and started eating everything.
sentences.cn: 很快蝗虫就飞落下来开始吃东西,什么都吃。

sentences.en: A plague of locusts afflicted the land.
